summary:
This mod adds 'Mako', the fire-bender from Legend of Korra. He can be found
at the Four-Shields tavern in Dragonbridge.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mako Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod adds 'Mako', the fire-bender from Legend of Korra. He can be found [/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]at the Four-Shields tavern in Dragonbridge.  He comes wielding fire magic, and uses some restoration and 
alteration spells during combat. He was made using entirely vanilla assets from the CK, along with a few things
from Dragonborn DLC.[/size][/font]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mod Features[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Expert fire mage [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps) [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Expert Destruction mage w/ emphasis on fire[/size][/font]
[/list]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]Very big thanks goes out to;

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's Renewal[/url]﻿ by Kalilies & Stealthic [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]﻿ by LogRaam[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mods I'm using (Not included, but recommended) [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males[/url]﻿ by Chris57 & FavoredSoul [/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
